content: My tester file gave me a 5/5 for the functions and it was working properly, but the autograder minused me some points. I would want to see if the error in the autograder was a result of format and not a mistake as the TAs told me if it was just format I can get some grades back.
subject: Can we check if the autograder for PSET 2 failed for one function because of a formatting issue?

content: @Kuan Wei Huang I think this was a student I talked to. They got like 91% but wanted as many points back as possible

Hi Noura, I took a look at your pset2 code. There's a bug in your wildcard implementation - when you enter a wildcard, the revealed letter is at the wrong place. Feel free to reach out if you have further questions. Thanks.
